alert.note: Alert for Flathead; Lake (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Avalanche Warning issued December 19 at 6:07AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: The following message is transmitted at the request of the Forest Service Flathead Avalanche Center Kalispell MT ...The Flathead Avalanche Center in Hungry Horse has issued a BACKCOUNTRY AVALANCHE WARNING for the following areas... * WHAT...The avalanche danger for the warning area is high today. Very dangerous avalanche conditions exist. * WHERE...Flathead Range, Whitefish Range, and Glacier National Park. * WHEN...In effect from 7:00 AM MST this morning to 7:00 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Wet, dense snow and blowing snow is overloading the dry, soft surface snow resulting in dangerous avalanche conditions.
info.instruction: Very dangerous avalanche conditions. Traveling in and below avalanche terrain is not recommended. Avalanches may run long distances. Consult http://www.flatheadavalanche.org for more detailed information. Similar avalanche danger may exist at locations outside the coverage area of any Avalanche Center.
